If the part_feature_template_definition is a , there shall be at most one document in the set of that has a of 'CAD filename'
The part_feature_template_definition shall have exactly one creation date.

ext_description.p: A physical_unit is a type of that implements the ARM concepts of:

ext_descriptions.ext_description: If the physical_unit is a , there shall be at most one document in the set of that has a of 'CAD filename'
The physical_unit shall have exactly one creation date.
The physical_unit shall have exactly one approval.
The physical_unit shall have at least one organization or as the creator.
The physical_unit shall have exactly one .
The physical_unit shall have a with a name of 'physical design' or 'physical design usage'.
The physical_unit shall be related to at most one property with a name of 'unit technology'.
If the physical_unit is a 'physical design usage' of an 'assembly module', it shall have at least one that is of type .
If the physical_unit is a 'physical design usage' of an 'assembly module', it shall have at most one representation with a name of 'maximum negative component height'
If the physical_unit is a 'physical design usage' of an 'assembly module', it shall have at most one representation with a name of 'maximum positive component height'.
If the physical_unit is a 'physical design usage' of an 'assembly module', it shall have exactly one 'functional design usage' specified as the implemented function.
If the physical_unit is a 'physical design' of an 'assembly module', it shall have no laminate components.
If the physical_unit is a 'physical design usage' of an 'interconnect module', it shall have no more than one 'functional design usage' specified as the 'implemented function'.
If the physical_unit is a 'physical design usage' of an 'interconnect module', it shall have at most one with a name of 'located interconnect module thickness'
If the physical_unit is a physical design usage of an interconnect module it shall be the definition for at most one with a name of 'interconnect module usage view physical characteristics'.

If the physical_unit is a physical design usage of an interconnect module it shall be the definition for at most one with a name of 'interconnect module usage view physical characteristics' and related to a with a name of 'minimum thickness over metal requirement'

If the physical_unit is a physical design usage of an interconnect module it shall be the definition for at most one with a name of 'interconnect module usage view physical characteristics' and related to a with a name of 'maximum thickness over metal requirement'

If the physical_unit is a physical design usage of an interconnect module it shall be the definition for at most one with a name of 'interconnect module usage view physical characteristics' and related to a with a name of 'minimum thickness over dielectric requirement'

If the physical_unit is a physical design usage of an interconnect module it shall be the definition for at most one with a name of 'interconnect module usage view physical characteristics' and related to a with a name of 'maximum thickness over dielectric requirement'
If the physical_unit is a physical design usage of an interconnect module it shall be the definition for at most one with a name of 'restraint' or 'tolerance specific restraint'.
If the physical_unit is a 'physical design usage' of an 'interconnect module', it shall have no more than one that is implementation of secondary surface.
If the physical_unit is a 'physical design usage' of an 'interconnect module', it shall have no more than one that is implementation of primary surface.
If the physical_unit is a 'physical design usage' of an 'interconnect module', it shall have no more than one that is implementation of edge surface.

If the physical_unit that is a design view of an assembly module is referenced by an through the attribute, at least one of the members of that are related by the of that shall be related by members of to this physical_unit.

If the physical_unit that is a design view of an assembly module is referenced by an through the attribute, each member of that are related by the of that shall be related by members of to this physical_unit.

If the physical_unit that is a design view of an assembly module is referenced by an through the attribute, the that is related by the \ . attribute of that shall be positioned by a member of which also references that .
If the physical_unit that is a design view of an interconnect module, there shall be exactly one primary design layer stratum related to the physical_unit by an .
